name: Threshold For Adventure
description:
This is a game I made for my University Major Project.

This an RPG adventure game. You can create your own character and explore the game world.

Controls:

Mouse clicks or WASDMovementEsc keyMenuSpacebarQuick menu

The player cursor will change when hovering over an interactive option. Green to talk, red to attack and yellow to pick up.

Dialogue options for certain NPCs will bring up barter screen or allow player to begin quests.

The game will auto-save after player actions. Save games are sorted by character name.
